resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: 𐌍𐌀𐌂·𐌈𐌄 𐌚𐌀𐌓𐌉𐌄·𐌅𐌄𐌋/𐌉𐌉𐌖𐌍𐌀𐌔·𐌈𐌀𐌌𐌖𐌂𐌄 / 𐌂𐌋𐌄𐌅𐌀·𐌄𐌕𐌖𐌍𐌀𐌋·/𐌌𐌀𐌔𐌀𐌍·𐌕𐌉𐌖𐌓 / 𐌖𐌍𐌉𐌀𐌔·𐌑𐌄𐌋𐌀𐌂𐌄 Transcription:Nac Θefarie Vel/iiunas θamuce / cleva etunal / Masan tiur / Unias šelace Possible translation:When Tiberius Velianas had built the statue of the sanctuary [in] the month of Masan, Uni was pleased
resource.chars:
𐌍𐌀𐌂·𐌈𐌄 𐌚𐌀𐌓𐌉𐌄·𐌅𐌄𐌋/𐌉𐌉𐌖𐌍𐌀𐌔·𐌈𐌀𐌌𐌖𐌂𐌄 / 𐌂𐌋𐌄𐌅𐌀·𐌄𐌕𐌖𐌍𐌀𐌋·/𐌌𐌀𐌔𐌀𐌍·𐌕𐌉𐌖𐌓 / 𐌖𐌍𐌉𐌀𐌔·𐌑𐌄𐌋𐌀𐌂𐌄

 

Transcription:

Nac Θefarie Vel/iiunas θamuce / cleva etunal / Masan tiur / Unias šelace

 

Possible translation:

When Tiberius Velianas had built the statue of the sanctuary [in] the month of Masan, Uni was pleased

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: 𐌅/𐌀𐌂𐌀𐌋·𐌕𐌌𐌉𐌀𐌋·𐌀/𐌅𐌉𐌋𐌙𐌅𐌀𐌋·𐌀𐌌𐌖𐌂/𐌄·𐌐𐌖𐌋𐌖𐌌𐌙𐌅/𐌀·𐌔𐌍𐌖𐌉𐌀𐌘 Transcription:V/acal tmial a/vilχval amuc/e pulumχv/a snuiaφ Possible translation:The votives of the temple yearly have been as numerous as the stars
resource.chars:
𐌅/𐌀𐌂𐌀𐌋·𐌕𐌌𐌉𐌀𐌋·𐌀/𐌅𐌉𐌋𐌙𐌅𐌀𐌋·𐌀𐌌𐌖𐌂/𐌄·𐌐𐌖𐌋𐌖𐌌𐌙𐌅/𐌀·𐌔𐌍𐌖𐌉𐌀𐌘

 

Transcription:

V/acal tmial a/vilχval amuc/e pulumχv/a snuiaφ

 

Possible translation:

The votives of the temple yearly have been as numerous as the stars
